title: Free product of Demushkin groups as absolute Galois group
abstract:
We prove that a free profinite (pro-$p$) product over a set converging to 1
of countably many Demushkin groups of rank $\aleph_0$, $G_i$, that can be
realized as absolute Galois groups, is isomorphic to an absolute Galois group
if and only if $\log_pq(G_i)\to \infty$.
